feed.title: Crafty Controller Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Crafty Controller: Crafty v4.4.3
entry.content:
Changelog

--- [4.4.3] - 2024/08/08

Bug fixes

  • Fix schedules creation fail due to missing action ID (Merge Request)

entry.title: New release for Crafty Controller: Crafty v4.4.4
entry.content:
Changelog

--- [4.4.4] - 2024/10/03

Bug fixes

  • Migrations | Fix orphan schedule configurations crashing migration operation (Merge Request)
  • Fix logic issue causing bedrock wizard's root files buttons to not respond to user click events (Merge Request)
  • Reset crash detection counter after crash detection process detects successful start (Merge Request)
  • Update new bedrock DL url and correctly bubble up exception on DL fail - Thanks @sarcastron (Merge Request)
  • Bump cryptography for GHSA-h4gh-qq45-vh27 (Merge Request)

entry.title: New release for Crafty Controller: Crafty v4.4.5
entry.content:
Changelog

NOTE Version effected by non-root docker issue if you installed from this version see RCA document

--- [4.4.5] - 2025/01/19

Refactor

  • Refactor and standardize all JSON validator errors returning human readable translations (Merge Request)
  • Improve docker-build CI/CD, supporting nightly builds (Merge Request)
  • Standardize and centralize CSS throughout front end, Allows for easier management of themes (Merge Request)

Bug fixes

  • Bump requests to resolve yank for CVE-2024-35195 (Merge Request)
  • Better handle malformed mcping data (Merge Request)
  • Resolve type issue when posting no keywords in the "keyword" field in config.json tab (Merge Request)
  • Resolve issue where sometimes backup migration 20240308_multi-backup would run twice (Merge Request)

Tweaks

  • Dyamically change child action translation for backups (Merge Request)
  • Remove EXIF image data on app Background Photos (Merge Request)
  • Bump Docker base image 22.04 -> 24.04 (Merge Request)
  • Bump python pip 2.0.3 -> 24.3.1 (Merge Request)
  • Bump python setuptools 50.3.2 -> 75.6.0 (Merge Request)
  • Bump tornado for CVE-2024-52804 (Merge Request)

Lang

  • Weblate Translation Platform Integration
  • Remove incomplete labels from translation files to better support new translation workflow (Merge Request)
  • New langs added ja_JP, ko_KR (Merge Request)
